testcase.name: Verify Expire Token playlistitem api functionality
testcase.system-out: When user are using Expire token "get_newrelease" with "get" http request...passed Then user verify message is "The access token expired"......................passed Then user are verify invalid status code is "401"...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify if missing requiredfield payload with Create_playlist api functionality its working
testcase.system-out: Given missing requiredfield payload to add playlist.........................passed When user are calling "post_createplaylist" with "post" http request........passed Then user verify invalid message is "Missing required field"................passed Then user are verify invalid status code is "400"...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify if blank payload with Create_playlist api functionality its working
testcase.system-out: Given blank payload to add playlist.........................................passed When user are calling "post_createplaylist" with "post" http request........passed Then user verify invalid message is "Error parsing JSON."...................passed Then user are verify invalid status code is "400"...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify if wrong url with Create_playlist api functionality its working

testcase.name: Verify if invalid Userid with Create_playlist api functionality its working
testcase.system-out: Given add playlist..........................................................passed When user are calling with invalid userid to "post_createplaylist" with "post" http request.passed Then user verify message is "You cannot create a playlist for another user.".passed Then user are verify invalid status code is "403"...........................passed
